verbose_text: An increase in the ubiquitylation of human Hsp90 was shown to inhibit its function and cause a dissociation of client protein, including p53, Cdk4 (cyclin dependent kinase 4) and Plk (Polo like kinase 1), Akt1 and eNOS, which were subsequently degraded by the proteasome [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
